title: Not Even Lizzo Can Teach Macaulay Culkin How to Dance
text:
One of these people can dance. Photo: Getty Images

If you expected to find Macaulay Culkin home alone last night, you’d be very mistaken — because he spent the evening at Lizzo’s Hollywood Palladium performance, the smart choice for anyone within a 50-mile radius. And Lizzo wouldn’t let him get away with simply watching the show from the audience either. The actor and former front man of comedic band the Pizza Underground joined Lizzo onstage for her “Gigolo Game” to show the crowd how he gigolos … which looks to be a one-legged sprinkler move? But Lizzo, queen of positivity that she is, and her dancers joined in, even if we all know they have better moves. Lizzo herself once toured with comedic act Har Mar Superstar, a vigilant commenter points out, so who knows — maybe there’s a collaboration to be had here? And maybe she could give Mac some more formal lessons while she’s at it. Watch below, via Stereogum.
description: “Home Alone” star Macaulay Culkin joined Lizzo at her show in Los Angeles last night to show off his dance moves.
